entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as the family that Harry lives with. They are introduced in the text as Uncle Vernon and his household.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a member of the Dursley family and is mentioned as being present in the kitchen. He is described as barking at Harry to comb his hair.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon scolds Harry by telling him to comb his hair. This is mentioned in the text as Uncle Vernon barking at Harry.
